objects.name: Analytic 1359
objects.description: Detects anomalous use of Mach ports, Apple Events, or XPC services for inter-process execution or code injection. Focuses on unexpected processes attempting to send privileged Apple Events (e.g., automation scripts injecting into security-sensitive apps).

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:unifiedlog
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: Unusual Mach port registration or access attempts between unrelated processes

x_mitre_log_source_references.name: macos:osquery
x_mitre_log_source_references.channel: exec: Unexpected execution of osascript or AppleScript targeting sensitive apps

x_mitre_mutable_elements.description: Whitelisted app-to-app Apple Event communications (e.g., Finder automation).
Baseline of Mach ports and XPC services normally used in the environment.
